title: Marham.pk Doctors Scraper
description: Extract doctor listings from Marham.pk, Pakistan's leading healthcare platform. Search by specialty and city to find verified doctors with qualifications, fees, reviews, and contact information using sitemap and JSON-LD extraction.

startUrls.title: Start URLs (optional)
startUrls.description: Array of Marham.pk doctor profile URLs to scrape. If provided, specialty and city filters will be ignored.

city.title: City
city.description: City to search in (e.g., 'lahore', 'karachi', 'islamabad', 'rawalpindi', 'faisalabad'). Leave empty for all cities.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of doctors
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of doctor profiles to collect from the sitemap.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for scraping. Residential proxies recommended for better reliability.
